content.title: production update
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 22, 2025
content.content:
good morning,
We give you a new update:
All the main blocks for the Kickstarter campaign have been processed, both the numbered and unnumbered series, and we have already started with the final phase.
The rubber parts are already being processed. At the moment, we see no hiccups ahead.
We thank you for your support, we will not let you down.
Until next time
Graziano
you are in good hands

content.title: you begin to see the first pieces
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 20, 2025
content.content:
We have started working on the first batch of yogapods in order to fulfil all possible bookings in the Kickstarter campaign and to be able to deliver as promised.
We will update you again in the coming days.
Your trust fills us with energy.
Please help us spread the word about this Kickstarter campaign.
We thank you!
Graziano

content.title: production begins
content.creator:
YOGAPOD
February 15, 2025
content.content:
The yogapod is new and is being born in an Italian company, one of those family businesses where passion and competence come first.
We have always focused on doing our job well and we realise that we still have a lot to learn in marketing.
That is why we decided to make you as much a part of this moment as possible, to do our best to earn your trust.
Yesterday the material arrived to start production, and today processing began.
Until the next update!
